parameters: Ah, you must be the new maids.

\!
I am Sofia, the Head Maid. Follow me, please.
Ah, I do hope Mistress enjoys her adventures with you~! ♥
Those of us who remain here as maids are entranced by our own choice now. ♥

\!
So do not worry, we will keep the Chateau in perfect condition! ♥
...Did you just step in my way, you worthless slut?
Remove yourself from my presence immediately.
I beg your pardon, but are you completely brainless?!
Very well. You have pushed your luck too far.

\!
Prepare yourself for an eternity of punishment...
